alert.note: Alert for Rains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 28 at 6:06PM CDT until April 28 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Rains County in north central Texas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 606 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Emory, or 12 miles northeast of Wills Point, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Emory, East Tawakoni, Lake Tawakoni, Lake Fork Reservoir, Flats and Hermits Cove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
